testimonials.name: Alex M.
testimonials.text: Rrish has transformed my guitar playing completely. His teaching approach is patient, encouraging, and incredibly effective. In just 6 months, I've gone from beginner to confidently playing my favorite songs. The performance insights he shares are invaluable.

testimonials.name: Jenny S.
testimonials.text: As an adult learner, I was nervous about starting guitar lessons. Rrish made me feel comfortable from day one and tailored the lessons perfectly to my pace and interests. His real-world performing experience makes the lessons so much more engaging.

testimonials.name: Blake
testimonials.text: Rrish is an amazing teacher who really helped me understand blues improvisation. His patient approach and clear explanations made learning enjoyable and effective.

testimonials.name: Mark T.
testimonials.text: My 12-year-old son has been taking lessons with Rrish for 8 months now. The progress has been amazing! Rrish keeps him engaged and motivated, and his teaching style really connects with young learners. Highly recommend!

testimonials.name: Rachel K.
testimonials.text: Rrish helped me bridge the gap between playing covers and understanding music theory. His performance-based approach to theory makes it practical and memorable. I'm now writing my own songs thanks to his guidance!
